text: Nosratollah Vahdat (; 7 September 1925 â€“ 6 October 2020) was an Iranian comedian, actor, and director. He was born in Isfahan, Iran. His career began in 1950. His best known works were Luck and Love and Coincidence (1959), The Doll Behind the Window (1960), A Passenger from Heaven (1963) and Yek Esfahani dar sarzamin-e Hitler (1968). Vahdat died on 6 October 2020 in Tehran from pneumonia, aged 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Iranian movie directors Category:Actors from Isfahan Category:Iranian comedians
title: Nosratollah Vahdat
